description:
Відслідковуйте планові відключення електроенергії за допомогою застосунку “Світло”. 
Застосунок дозволяє вам зручно переглядати час та тривалість планових відключень електроенергії для вашого регіону.

Основні функції:
- Графіки відключення: Переглядайте дані у зручному форматі.
- Віджет на головному екрані: Відслідковуйте час відключення обраної локації на головному екрані смартфону.
- Нагадування: Встановлюйте нагадування за 30хв про відключення електроенергії
- Повідомлення про екстрені відключення: Відслідковуйте статус  на головному екрані застосунку про екстрені відключення світла в вашому регіоні

Як користуватися:
1. Виберіть свій регіон та чергу, перегляньте графіки планових відключень.
2. Закріпіть обрану локацію, щоб відслідковувати інформацію через віджет
3. Налаштуйте нагадування для отримання сповіщень про відключення за 30хв.

Доступні регіони:
- м. Київ
- Київська обл.
- Львівська обл.
- Дніпропетровська обл. (ДТЕК, ЦЕК)
- Одеська обл.
- Харківська обл.
- Миколаївська обл.
- Чернігівська обл.
- Тернопільська обл.
- Вінницька обл.
- Сумська обл.
 Список регіонів буде розширюватись.

Застереження:
- Дані про планові відключення електроенергії ми отримуємо з відкритих джерел обласних енергетичних провайдерів відповідного регіону
- Цей застосунок не представляє будь-яку політичну організацію, компанію або обленерго. Ви використовуєте дані, надані в цьому застосунку, виключно на свій власний ризик.

Слідкуйте за останніми новинами на нашій сторінці в телеграм: https://t.me/svitloapp

Привіт-привіт

Це get get — всебонусний застосунок, з яким ти отримаєш більше від щоденних покупок. Просто скануй будь-які чеки: з магазинів, аптек, заправок — і отримуй за це бонуси. А потім — обмінюй їх на подарунки від улюблених брендів 

Чому саме get get?
– Бонуси за всі покупки — без винятків
– Подарунки, знижки й сертифікати замість пилючних балів
– Легко, зручно й швидко — усе в одному застосунку
– Персоналізовані пропозиції — акції саме для тебе
– А ще — трохи радості щодня

Завантажуй get get і скануй на радість!

Застосунок єСвітло створено для простоти відслідковування графіків погодинних відключень електроенергії у Чернівецькій області.
Розроблено компанією InterCode за підтримки АТ "Чернівціобленерго"

Kyiv in your pocket.
Kyiv Digital is there for you when you need it. Pay for fare and get air raid alerts in the blink of an eye. Receive public transport info, park without a hitch, and more! With our app, the city is at your service.

— Take care of your car
Park and get around town without any fines.

— Stay in the know
Don't miss out on the latest events and access useful contacts in a flash.

We're improving Kyiv Digital every single day to make life in the city even more convenient for you.

If you have any questions, our support team is always ready to help at support@kyiv.digital

app_name: Amora: A Hint of Your Soulmate
description:
Your soulmate revealed.

Have you ever wondered what your soulmate looks like? Join thousands of people around the world and get a glimpse of your future love with a personalized drawing.

Using advanced personality psychology and relationship science, Amora creates a realistic portrait of your soulmate and reveals insights about your ideal partner and your compatibility.

And now – with our latest update – you can also explore your compatibility with friends and family. Amora is more than just a soulmate drawing app.

Get started in minutes

Download Amora
Complete your profile
Receive your drawing and personalized compatibility insights, including love language, attachment style, and warning signs
Unlock the new feature and discover who in your circle might be your soulmate

Terms of Use: https://litappslab.com/terms

Glovo is the #1 app for ordering anything you want! With more than 240,000 restaurants & stores available, and delivery in minutes. Download the app now & order a Glovo!

Easily order food, groceries and gifts in your city without leaving home.

Want to order food straight to your door? Or get a grocery delivery of your essentials? We save you time, when you don’t have it. 

WHY USE GLOVO?

▶ Over 80 million downloads worldwide.
▶ Order in 23 countries including Spain, Portugal, Romania, Morocco, Italy, Poland, Croatia, Ukraine, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tunisia, Kenya, Uganda, Ivory Coast, Nigeria, Bulgaria, Serbia, Armenia, Bosnia-herzegovina, Montenegro, Moldova & Andorra.
▶ More than 240,000 restaurants, supermarkets and stores available globally.
▶ Deliveries from the biggest chains: McDonald's, Burger King, KFC, Pizza Hut, Taco Bell, Telepizza, Starbucks, Domino’s Pizza, Carrefour, PENNY., Eataly, Flying Tiger, Kiko Milano, Lafarmacia, Auchan, Decathlon, MediaMarkt and many more.
▶ Your favourite food delivery in minutes: Order burgers, pizza, chicken, kebab, pasta, sandwiches, sushi, poké…anything you want.
▶ Pay however you like. We accept PayPal, card payment, cash and even restaurant vouchers.
▶ Track your delivery or takeaway in real time and chat with our support team if need be.
▶ Subscribe to Glovo Prime and get unlimited free deliveries of food, groceries, and shopping. Save on every delivery! Available in selected countries.
▶ Invite your friends and earn money for each one who places an order on the app.

YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD, IN MINUTES!

Fancy a tasty dinner? Has it been a long day? You deserve to have your food delivered to your door! Or are you on your way somewhere? You can order food to take away and grab it on the go.

With Glovo, you can order up to 65 different types of food in your city. Including a burger from the most famous restaurants, to ordering from your favourite sushi place. There are more than 216,000 restaurants available worldwide for delivery or takeaway of your favourite food, in a matter of minutes.


GROCERY DELIVERY WITHOUT LEAVING HOME

Forget something from the supermarket? Got friends over and want to order another round of drinks or snacks? 

Now you can also order your groceries from the supermarket. Choose whatever you want from your favourite supermarket or local store and Glovo will deliver it to you in a few minutes. Food, snacks, drinks, something sweet, a missing ingredient... any groceries you need! 


THE APP TO ORDER ANYTHING

Glovo delivers everything. Find more than 27000 stores on the app, with all kinds of products. All your shopping on one app: surprise gifts, a last-minute purchase or whatever you need.

And if you need to send or pick up something in your city, Glovo can run errands for you. Choose a pick-up and delivery point and a courier will take care of the rest, with delivery in minutes!


NEED HELP? CONTACT US

If you’re looking for help with an order or have any questions about Glovo, please contact our support team via the support section in our app or on our website.

You can also find us on:
▶ Our site: https://glovoapp.com/ 
▶ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/glovoappES 
▶ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/glovo_es/ 
▶ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Glovo_ES

Download Glovo now! Order food, groceries, shopping or courier service - with delivery in minutes.

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

Boost your dating confidence with Badoo— the dating app that makes it easy to express your true self.
 
It’s an encouraging, safe space that’s designed to help you make more meaningful connections.
 
How? By keeping it simple, helping you take action with confidence, and giving you the features and support you need to find whatever you’re searching for. Whether that’s dates, a long-term relationship, new friends, or chats.

Plus, with our latest tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, you can say hello to a fun and authentic dating experience. 
 
Download Badoo to take your dating confidence to another level."

Back yourself
On Badoo, it’s all about celebrating you and staying true to your needs. With our various features, it’s easy to put yourself out there with confidence.
Trust your experience
Badoo is a platform that prioritises authenticity. Profile photos can be verified and there are strict user guidelines in place.

How Badoo works
Focusing on who you are and what you want, here are some features making it easier for you to meet your kind of people:  
-Advanced Filters: Finesse your search, and save your time
-Profile Questions: Easily champion your personality
- People Nearby: Meet daters around you
- Encounters: Straight forward swiping, right to connect and left for skip
- Video Chat: Connect with your matches through face to face video calling
- Verified profiles: We have a three-step verification process which, once completed, you can choose to only interact with other verified profiles and find friends
- Blur intimate photos: Using AI, our Private Detector feature detects explicit photos and will let you decide if you want to view or block the image
- Deception Detector: Our new tech that aims to block fake, scam, and spam accounts, so you can have a fun and authentic dating experience"

Go Premium
Maximise your dating experience. When you upgrade to Badoo Premium, you’ll unlock plenty of features that will make it even easier to find meaningful connections:

- See who's already liked you
- Find exactly what you’re looking for with unlimited Advanced Filters
- Get your messages read first
- Send unlimited likes
 - Control who sees your profile with Invisible Mode
- Undo accidental left swipes  
- And much more...

The price varies by country and may change without notice, but you can always see the exact price in the app. We will charge your card and your subscription will be automatically renewed unless you deactivate the automatic recharge a minimum of 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. Badoo Premium is flexible and adapts to your needs - you can cancel your subscription at any time.

PURE is a dating app for curious people to show up in their most playful version of themselves. It’s a space to be honest with your intentions and clear in your boundaries.

Connect with like-minded community to create and explore new exciting experiences in a safe and supportive space.

Let your imagination go wild and get ready for amazing dates!

* HOW PURE WORKS?
Everything starts with Personal Ads. To see other people in the feed, you need to post your Ad. Write what kind of experience you are looking for and find someone who would share the same experience with you. Be creative and original with your ads, that's always appealing.

* IN PURE ALL BORDERS ARE OPEN
Paris, New-York or London? You can check any city worldwide and meet people from PURE community from around the globe.  

* WHAT HAPPENS IN PURE STAYS IN PURE
Photos self-destruct right after being seen, and in case someone takes a screenshot, you will get a notification about that. Also, all chat messages, including photos and audio, shared in chats cannot be saved to the phone's gallery.

* OUR MISSION IS TO KEEP PURE A PURE EXPERIENCE
Safety of our community is one of our key priorities. We are constantly improving our algorithms to find and get rid of scam and spam accounts, also our system sends automatic alerts on trigger words that might be used by scammers, so don't be surprised in case you will get a warning. 
Keep chatting anonymously via PURE and do not switch to other messengers. You know what they say: better safe than sorry. 

PURE uses auto-renewing subscriptions — you have to subscribe to get inside.
Here’s what you should know about PURE subscriptions:

- If you choose to purchase a weekly, monthly or annual subscription you will be able to go online and interact via chats with other users during the chosen subscription period. The prices may vary per country and are subject to change with a notice. Prices are clearly displayed in the app.
- All subscriptions renew automatically unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period without any limitations.
- Auto-renewal can be canceled at any time by going to your settings in the Apple Store after the purchase.
- All personal data is handled under PURE’s privacy policy https://pure.app/content/en/privacy
- Terms and conditions: https://pure.app/terms/

Quickly and easily connect and control your smart home devices through SmartThings.
SmartThings is compatible with 100s of smart home brands. So you can control all of your smart home gadgets in one place, including your Samsung Smart TV and smart home appliances.
With SmartThings, you can connect, monitor and control multiple smart home devices quicker and easier. Connect your Samsung smart TVs, smart appliances, smart speakers and brands like Ring, Nest and Philips Hue - all from one app.
Then control your smart devices using voice assistants including Google Assistant

[Key Features]
- Control and check in on your home from wherever you are
- Connect your smart devices across many different brands to work together by setting ‘scenes’
- Build routines that are set on time, weather, and device status, so your home runs smoothly in the background
- Allow shared control by giving access to other users
- Receive status updates about your devices with automated notifications
- Talk to your devices using Google Assistant
- Track, monitor and save money on energy with SmartThings Energy. See how much your home and compatible Samsung devices cost to run, and try various energy saving features, such as AI saving mode, or schedule devices to run during off peak hours.
- Receive recipe recommendations by scanning meal kits, wine, and meat. Plan, shop and prep meals with the help of SmartThings Cooking 

※ Some features may not be available in all countries.

[App requirements]
Some mobile devices may not be supported.
- iOS 16.0 or later / iPhone 6s or later / iPad mini 4 or later

※ App permissions
The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed. 

[Required access permissions]
-
 
[Optional access permissions]
• Bluetooth: to find nearby devices using Bluetooth or BLE
• Microphone: Used to set up ultrasonic sensor-equipped devices
• Camera: Scan QR codes.
• Location: to automate actions using GPS (GPS optional)
                    Used to find Wi-Fi information to add devices with iOS 13 or later versions
• Contacts: Used to verify user information that will be used when sending text messages

Looking for the perfect love app?

Couple Widget lets you check your days together and automatically reminds you of special anniversaries. Record your Love Story and first moments, then share them with your partner to stay close.

* Never miss an anniversary: reminders for 10/100 days, the day before, and more

Download Couple Widget and make every day a little more special!

developer: AJAX SCIENTIFIC AND PRODUCTION ENTERPRISE LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY
description:
Ajax covers security and comfort, intrusion protection, fire detection, water leak prevention, and video surveillance — all seamlessly automated and integrated. The system promptly notifies users and an alarm receiving center of any intrusion, fire, or flooding. Ajax also supports automation scenarios, which enhance the protection and comfort of the facility. 

IN THE APP:

◦ Intuitive security and comfort control on the go 
◦ System events monitoring
◦ Critical alerts, even when the phone is muted
◦ Mobile panic button
◦ Real-time monitoring with video/photo verification
◦ Automation scenarios
• • • 
Security & Fire Excellence Awards 2023
SecurityInfoWatch.com Readers’ Choice Awards
PSI Premier Awards 2023
GIT Security Award 2023 


2.5 million people in 187 countries are protected by Ajax.

BUILD YOUR OWN SECURITY AND COMFORT SYSTEM WITH AJAX DEVICES


INTRUSION PROTECTION
The detectors instantly capture an intruder on your property, doors or windows opening, and glass breaking. As soon as a person enters a protected area, they will be captured by a detector from the MotionCam series, an Ajax camera, or a third-party camera. You and the security company will know what happened at the facility within just a few seconds.

VIDEO SURVEILLANCE IN THE SMARTPHONE 
Ajax cameras, powered by proprietary video streaming technology, offer an integrated and efficient surveillance solution. Synchronized with system events, they grant users access to video data and enable customizable scenario-based recordings.
The video wall provides real-time views across large areas or multiple sites without system overload. 

ONE CLICK, AND HELP IS ON THE WAY
In case of an emergency, press the panic button on the app to immediately transmit the event and smartphone coordinates to the security company. 

FIRE DETECTION
Fire detectors notify of smoke and temperature spikes and promptly alert about dangerous carbon monoxide (CO) concentrations, which have no color, smell, or taste. Configure programmable actions for ManualCallPoint to open electric locks, cut power to devices, and activate ventilation with a simple press.

FLOOD PREVENTION
LeaksProtect Jeweller notifies users of a pipe break, a washing machine leak, or an overflowing bathtub. WaterStop Jeweller automatically shuts off the water if LeaksProtect Jeweller or a third-party water leak detector is triggered. Control WaterStop Jeweller and check its status from anywhere in the world via the Ajax app. Create a scenario to shut off the water at a specific time or when arming the system.

AUTOMATION SCENARIOS
Change security modes according to a schedule, program outdoor lighting to turn on when strangers are detected on your property, or implement an anti-flood system. Manage gates, electric locks, lighting, heating, and electrical appliances. Activate ventilation, simulate home activity, or switch off potential ignition sources.

PROFESSIONAL LEVEL OF RELIABILITY
The hub runs on OS Malevich, which is protected from failures, viruses, and cyberattacks. Thanks to the backup battery and communication channels, the system is resistant to power outages or the lack of Internet connectivity. The account is protected by session control and two-factor authentication. Ajax devices were tested for compliance with various requirements, rules, and regulations and have been rated as Grade 2 and Grade 3.

CONNECTING TO THE SECURITY COMPANY MONITORING STATION
The largest alarm receiving centers in 187 countries work with the Ajax security systems.

• • •

Ajax equipment is required to work with the app. You can buy the devices from authorized Ajax Systems partners in your region.

Learn more: ajax.systems

Have any questions? Write to support@ajax.systems

LUN – apartments, houses, all residential real estate in your smartphone! All new builds, secondary market, and now even rentals! 

The updated and improved LUN is the best way to find an apartment or house in Ukraine. View all listings from the most popular sites in the country in one place, set detailed filters and housing parameters, and our powerful LUN AI algorithms will simplify and speed up your search. With 3D models of residential complexes and video room tours of apartments, you can choose apartments stress-free from the comfort of your home. Create your own listings and sell or rent out your property or other real estate objects.

With our app, you will always stay informed about the latest new builds, and our photo correspondents track the progress of their construction daily. View them on the map, see detailed descriptions and photos of new builds in various regions, including Kyiv and suburbs, Lviv and suburbs, Odesa, Dnipro, Kharkiv, Ivano-Frankivsk, Ternopil, Khmelnytskyi, Vinnytsia, Poltava, Chernivtsi, Lutsk, Cherkasy, Rivne, and Zhytomyr.

In our app, you will also find detailed plans of all available apartments that you can purchase. Our team regularly updates price information by contacting reliable developers and their sales departments.

Our key advantages:

• Convenient map with all houses in your city and suburbs, including metro schematics and important landmarks.
• Video room tours that allow you to view the apartment stress-free from home.
• Listings from the most popular sites in the country, allowing you to find any property in one place.
• LUN AI combines duplicate listings from different realtors for the same apartment.
• Access to realtor or owner contacts for quick messaging or calls directly from the app.
• Form to create a listing: create a listing and sell or rent your property.
• Detailed 3D models and drone flights of residential complexes for instant visual assessment.

LUN app features:

• Extremely user-friendly interface for easy searching of apartments, houses, and other real estate.
• A variety of filters for selecting the necessary parameters (address, renovation status, etc.), saving time and enabling quick searches.
• Ability to publish your properties for free and instantly through the app.
• Receive push notifications about new offers or discounts.

Don't miss your chance to rent or buy your ideal home!
Download LUN now and check out all the new constructions in your region.
Leave a review to help us improve.

Презентуємо тобі оновлений додаток Lokal! Ще більше персональних пропозицій, захопливих викликів та можливостей для учасників Спільноти!

Lokal – це програма лояльності Холдингу емоцій “!FEST", яка діє у мережі закладів та партнерів !FEST. Для участі у програмі потрібно мати картку лояльності Lokal, яку можна отримати зареєструвавшись у мобільному додатку. 

Користуючись додатком ти маєш можливість:

Накопичувати та списувати спеціальну валюту спільноти – бофони в мережі закладів та партнерів !FEST
Бути в курсі актуальних подій та новин мережі
Отримувати персональні пропозиції, миттєві знижки та файні подарунки
Скористатись унікальними перевагами до дня народження
Приєднатись до участі у Викликах – отримувати Відзнаки та нагороди
Залишити відгуки про обслуговування в нашій мережі
Запросити друзів до Спільноти
Замовляти !Fest Доставку з наших ресторанів
Дізнаватися про заклади нашої мережі по всій Україні
Обмінювати бофони на цікаві Презенти
Долучитися до благодійних ініціатив !Фонду вільних і небайдужих

А ще, ти зможеш:

Слідкувати за балансом бофонів на своєму рахунку
Налаштувати особистий профіль
Переглянути історію покупок та сповіщень
Знайти заклади в своєму місті
Залишити зворотний зв'язок

Завантажуй додаток та користай унікальні можливості!

Доречі, ми оновили Політику конфіденційності, бо програмі LOKAL вже більше 10 років.

Altegio.me — all bookings in one app.

Book beauty services, workouts, or medical procedures in one app. Rebooking takes just two clicks anytime, day or night.

Stay flexible: Easily change the time or day of your appointment. No need to search for the salon's social media, text, or call the administrator.

Keep Important Information Handy: In Altegio.me, you can see the date and time of your appointment, as well as the address and contact information. No more unnecessary screenshots or notes on your phone!

Book at favorable conditions: Quick access to your bonus cards, as well as promotions and discounts from places you've already been.

Manage memberships and subscriptions: Altegio.me shows the validity period of subscriptions and the remaining visits. Easily renew subscriptions or purchase certificates directly in the app.

developer: Hangzhou Dong Bin Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
The DMSS app can enhance your security management efficiency. You can watch real-time surveillance videos and play them back anytime, anywhere, via Wi-Fi or cellular networks. If a device alarm is triggered, DMSS will immediately push an instant notification to you.

DMSS offers：
1. Real-time Live View：
You can view real-time surveillance videos from the added devices anytime, anywhere, to help you better monitor the safety of your home environment.

2. Video Playback：
You can quickly find the events you care about by date and event category, and playback the required historical video footage.

3. Instant Alarm Notifications：
You can subscribe to different alarm events according to your needs.  When an event is triggered, you will immediately receive the message notification.

4. Device Sharing
You can share the device with family members for shared use and assign them different usage permissions.

5. Alarm Hub
You can add a variety of peripheral accessories to the alarm hub to provide warnings for potential theft, intrusion, fire, water damage, and other situations. In case of an unforeseen event, DMSS can immediately activate alarms and send out danger notifications.

6. Visual Intercom
You can add visual intercom devices to engage in video calls between the device and the DMSS, as well as perform functions like locking and unlocking.

7. Access Control
You can add access control devices to check the current status of doors and view unlock records, as well as perform remote unlocking operations on the doors.

Lotus Lantern BLE 4.0 is an intelligent APP to control RGB(W) LED strip. It can adjust the brightness and color of LED strip, also has the music and microphone rhythm function, and build in many transition patterns of color and brightness.
